Plot: A seventeen year-old navigates his survival amongst an explosive criminal family and the detective who thinks he can save him.
Title: Animal Kingdom
Actors: James Frecheville, Bryce Lindemann, Paul Smits, Jacki Weaver
tomatoConsensus: With confident pacing, a smart script, and a top-notch cast, Animal Kingdom represents the best the Australian film industry has to offer.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 38 wins & 54 nominations.
